name: Hazy Power
author: DreadKnight
notes: Fenghuang was a surprisingly decent tech since it can wipe out the entire back row, and it also bounces back so you don't have to worry about Lava Golem. I don't think Cosmic Cyclone was that relevant in my duels, accept for one, when I got rid of someone's Mausoleum after they payed the cost and someone who was using Toon World, so feel free to replace it with Big Cattle Drive.
